definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: And the NMD program is, in essence, an U.S. program of unilateral nuclear expansion, which harbors the inherent danger of triggering an arms race at a higher level.
sentences.chinese: 美国此举显然孕育着引发更高水平上军备竞赛的危险。

sentences.english: I finished my job about editing the contest question about biology today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我已经完成关于生物竞赛题的编辑整理工作。

sentences.english: At what point does the RO decide to abandon in deteriorating weather conditions?
sentences.chinese: 天气恶化时，裁判长在什么时刻决定放弃竞赛？

sentences.english: We must remain serene and calm, we have wasted points, but the race continues.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须保持平常心，我们丢分了，但竞赛仍在继续。

sentences.english: Nearlly all the sports practised nowadays are competitive.
sentences.chinese: 今天几乎所有的体育活动都是竞赛性的。

sentences.english: We played on New Years eve day and then flew to Canada on New Years Day.
sentences.chinese: 我们新大打了一场竞赛，然后在新年飞到加拿大。

sentences.english: All exhibitors are welcome to take part in the International Competition and Awarding held by the organizer.
sentences.chinese: 所有参展方均可参与西安世园会国际竞赛及评奖。

sentences.english: He waited for the announcement of the result of the competition with bated breath.
sentences.chinese: 他屏息静气地等待宣布竞赛结果。

sentences.english: By way of analogy, we may say the results of a sports competition reflect the rules of the game.
sentences.chinese: 以体育竞赛为譬，可说是比赛结果反映游戏规则。

sentences.english: Knew that the carnival games had been gaffed .
sentences.chinese: 知道这些庆祝的表演竞赛已被不法之徒所操纵。

sentences.english: All the rules are to supply fair and equal conditions and basis for the competion.
sentences.chinese: 各项规则是为竞赛提供公平和平等的条件和依据。

sentences.english: Most of the competitors were knocked out of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 大多数竞赛者从竞赛中被淘汰出去了。

sentences.english: Most of the competitors were knocked out of the competition.
sentences.chinese: 大多数竞赛者从竞赛中被淘汰出去了。

sentences.english: In preparation for your Actua Cup campaign you can practice in friendlies and penalty shootout competitions.
sentences.chinese: 为冠军杯做准备，先在友谊赛和罚点球竞赛中练习。

sentences.english: What time is Quiz Show on?
sentences.chinese: 智力竞赛节目什么时候播放？

sentences.english: Any deviation from the center results in a downgrading during a competition.
sentences.chinese: 任何偏离滚转中心轴的动作都会在竞赛中被扣分。

definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
preliminary contest/initial heats of a competition
to compete/to take part in a competition
single-elimination open tournament (the winner stays on until he is himself defeated)
position in a ranking of names/place/rank
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
